page.title: 13Village Life in Cople
page.content:
We asked a staff member who lives in Cople about why they lived in the village. She has lived in Cople for 14 years since shortly after getting married.She likes village life because of the space, the country-side and its quietness.
She says that village social life is not lively enough for her 2 daughters. She would also like to see more activities in the village. They find the bus services inconvenient and expensive.
While the Post Office is very useful for stamps, she thinks the choice of grocery items limited, and their cost expensive. Having a car she goes to a supermarket in Bedford.
